userStories.title: Create src/execution/executor.ts with runExecutor function that loads project.json, finds the target phase, and executes tasks sequentially
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: Function exports runExecutor(opts: ExecuteOptions), loads project.json, finds phase by number or next pending, spawns agent for each task, monitors TASK_COMPLETE/CHECKPOINT/BLOCKED signals, updates phase status on completion

userStories.title: Create src/prompts/executor.md prompt template that instructs the agent to implement a task and emit proper signals
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: Prompt includes placeholders {TASK_DESCRIPTION}, {PROJECT_CONTEXT}, {PHASE_GOAL}, instructions for implementing task, running quality checks, committing with conventional format, and emitting TASK_COMPLETE/CHECKPOINT/BLOCKED signals

userStories.title: Wire execute command in cli.ts to call runExecutor from execution/executor.ts
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: case 'execute' in cli.ts imports and calls runExecutor with proper options (tool, phase, projectPath, promptDir, noVerify), passes --phase and --no-verify flags correctly

userStories.title: Test execute command end-to-end: create a test project.json, run ./marge.sh execute --phase 1, verify it spawns agent and processes signals
userStories.acceptanceCriteria: Running ./marge.sh execute --phase 1 with a valid project.json spawns the agent, displays output, and updates project.json phase status when complete. Typecheck passes: bunx tsc --noEmit
